title: Patent Eligibility
content: Laws of nature, natural phenomena, and abstract ideas are not patentable.

title: Subject Matter Eligibility
content: Specific guidance on software and abstract ideas (Alice check).

title: Claim Interpretation
content: Claims must be given their broadest reasonable interpretation (BRI).

title: Rejection of Claims
content: Basis for rejecting claims under 35 U.S.C. 102 and 103.

title: Order of Examination
content: Instructions on the order in which patent applications are examined.

title: Examiner's Letter or Action
content: Guidance on writing rejections and responses.
